comments.body: So should i take cs aiml at ec or msrit/bmsce cse?

Avoid AIML unless that's your last choice. 
Personally I'd prefer msrit and BMS if I got cse  , EC campus I've heard dosent have that many facilities and fests.

Cse at bmsce seems more viable considering finances and a balanced college life.
At 2.9k you'll mostly get CSE at EC campus

Hey , is aiml even available in ec campus ?
Last i checked , it's not
I heard it's getting introduced this year.
